phantom.translation[0].definitions[0].de: the image of a dead person or strange thing that someone thinks they see
phantom.translation[0].definitions[1].de: something that exists only in your imagination
phantom.translation[1].definitions[1].de: not real, but seeming real to the person affected
phantom.translation[1].definitions[1].no: phantom fat (=fat that someone believes they still have after they have lost weight)
phantom.translation[1].definitions[2].de: made to seem real in order to deceive people
phantom.translation[1].definitions[2].ex: Phantom contracts were used to make the company seem more successful than it was.
phantom.translation[1].definitions[3].de: used humorously to describe an unknown person that you blame for something annoying
phantom.translation[1].definitions[3].ex: The phantom pen stealer strikes again!
